name: Magic Popups
author: Vozax

sections.description:
Magic Popups

The Complete option for Popup building in wordpress where you can select any type of post to show as popup. Just select the options from the menus and generate the shortcodes and you are ready to GO!.A web page with a popup typically sees more conversions than the same page without a popup. More important, a page with a well designed and thoughtfully implemented popup converts better than one with an ugly popup. With Magic Popups plugin you can customize the popup according to your needs.

Magic Popups – Features:

  • Create and manage as many popups as you want – Magic Popups
  • Customize the look and feel of the popup – Magic Popups
  • Customize popup animation effect – Magic Popups
  • Set popup location on the screen – Magic Popups
  • Html popup – Magic Popups
  • Image popup – Magic Popups
  • Facebook popup – Magic Popups
  • Shortcode popup – Magic Popups

Magic Popups team constantly works on upgrades and improvements. With our upcoming updates we are planning to add more types of popups.

Thank you for using our popup plugin.

If you think that you found a bug in our Magic Popups plugin or have any questions, please feel free to contact us at team@vozax.com
Current Version of Magic Popups is 1.0.0

Vozax Team.
sections.installation:
Install Magic Popups either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server via FTP.

Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Go to the Magic Popups settings and select the post you want to make popup & set your desired options.
sections.faq:
How many popups can I create?

You can create as many popups as you want, there is no limit.

Can I have more than one popup on the same page?

You can have as many popups as you want on the same page, but you can only set one popup to be opened onpage load, the others must be set to open on wait time.

How can I set a popup to open automatically?

You can have a popup set with time limit after given time the popup will appear automatically on the page.

Can I put a popup to show after clicking something?

No, this feture is currently not available in the Magic Popups plugin.

Something is not working. What do I do?

Contact us! Depending on your server configuration something may go wrong, please don’t hesitate on contacting us, we are here to help you! Our support email is: team@vozax.com

Everything works PERFECT. What do I do?

Leave us a good review ðŸ™‚

short_description: The most complete popup plugin. Create Magic Popups with multiple selections & styles to show up on the front end.
